website_summaries.verdict: The designers at Penny have absolutely nailed the essence of these iconic Star Wars characters while retaining the smooth ride and classic look of this timeless skateboard.
pros: Features 4 Star Wars character designs: Darth Vader, Boba Fett, Imperial Stormtrooper, and R2-D2
Wheels match the character’s color scheme perfectly
cons: Only the Boba Fett and Darth Vader boards are available in both 22” and 27” sizes

customer_reviews.title: Badass Bobafett Skateboard...teenager approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied! Purchased this for my son’s birthday and he’s extremely particular about skateboards and all things Star Wars. Great quality of construction as well as the Star Wars image and detailing of the board. He says the bearings are really good as well. I’m satisfied with my purchase and I would highly recommend. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mochachica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, amazing price, and STAR WARS!
customer_reviews.text: After researching boards for my son’s first board, we discovered the Penny had the best reputation, although the price was higher than some. We were SO THRILLED to find these in my sons’s favorite Star Wars characters at such a great price! We bought Darth Vader first for his birthday, and then after a few weeks of getting good at riding, he decided he needed to add his favorite little droid to his collection. We bought an off brand for our 8 year old to ride along, and this quality FAR EXCEEDS brands that try to copy.
customer_reviews.author: Tired mama

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction and Material
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He's eight and he absolutely loves it. The board is top notch as far as hardware and the density of the deck plastic. The image is cool, but I wish it didn't wrap around a bit on the edges...it gives the board a sort of sloppy appearance. Otherwise, we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed board. Great theming. If you're a beginner start with the 27 inch.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Just make the packing right, please
customer_reviews.text: The package was poorly made and so the board is damaged when I received.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Beyond love the design. My innner Star Wars nerd is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Great old school penny board with starwars twist. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nesshal

customer_reviews.title: Brother liked it
customer_reviews.text: Don't know anything about skateboards but it made a nice Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: skater Star Wars fans unite
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. awesome. Met all expectations, and then some. Perfect for the Skater Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.author: Natzilla42

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Roller!
customer_reviews.text: This board has been a tremendous hit for the 10 year old kiddo. Smooth rolling. Easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Connor

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board... came slightly damaged. The R2 one looks the best; the colors are vibrant! One of the bearings is damaged though
customer_reviews.author: Edward P

customer_reviews.title: Arrived earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: It has arrived 10 days before the deadline! The package wasn't very well done but the board was in perfect conditions. The colour is a bit different from what I expected since is lighter but I must admit that this way I like it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco rosina

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Penny boards cost more but last and ride smoothly. The design on this one is also really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sissel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This product was the perfect Christmas gift for my Star Wars loving boyfriend! Such amazing quality and came in the coolest box! Such a great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Grace Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it said
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great time. Looked just as the pictures. Son enjoys using it everday!
customer_reviews.author: Annony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My son received as a Christmas present and he absolutely loved it. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks n Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Came out beautiful! And even faster than my old one. Amazing and would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: K'von Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board
customer_reviews.text: Rides well, It's a penny board so you know the quality will be there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skateboard!
customer_reviews.text: The skateboard arrived on time and is very well made. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane P.

customer_reviews.title: rides smooth, looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to upload photos of this board. I bought it today, but not from Amazon. I brought it home from Zumiez. I did not go into that store with the intention of purchasing a board, but I had to once I saw this Penny board. It's a 27" inch board, got it for $129. Looks just like the photos here. It rides great; it's very fast, smooth, and quiet, comparable to a longboard due to the type of wheels. I love that even the wheels are customized with text. This is actually my first Penny and I love it. It easily has better portability due to its size, as opposed to a regular skateboard or longboard.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Harvey

product_meta.title: Penny Australia x Star Wars Complete Skateboards
feature_bullets: Penny Australia x Star Wars Plastic Cruiser Fully Assembled
Choice of 22" or 27" Deck with Penny Skateboards Proven Durability
Premium Quality, Smooth Cruising 59mm, 83A Durometer Wheels
High Quality Color-Coded Abec 7 Stainless Steel Bearings
